title: For Sale: Addie Joss Portrait Sovereign 150 SGC **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: For Sale: Addie Joss Portrait Sovereign 150 SGC **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Card is not trimmed, but there is a tiny, miniscule spot in the yellow back ground that was touched up ( shows up in black light). Extremely rare back, PSA shows only 4 Sovereign 150's total of all grades. Spotless reverse....Sorry for the dark picture, card is much brighter with an astounding yellow color. For better pics, please email me.... Card otherwise is a 7 or 7.5, fantastic value at $685..... PRICE reduced to $595 **SOLD**
Where exactly is the spot?  Any chance you could show it on the pic?
